title: Chicago Cubs revenue 2001 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2013, gradually increasing from 2013 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 457.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 179.0 was reached at Year 2005
